title: Your Orders : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
How do I save my booking history?
This is absolutely effortless. Post a successful transaction, the booking details will automatically reflect under the
'Your Orders'
section on the app/website, once you log in via the same contact details which were used for the booking.
The app and website stores transaction history of the last 6 months up to 20 transactions only.
The provision to retrieve the past transaction history is unavailable.
NOTE: The provision to delete 'Your Orders' manually is unavailable.
